EmailTemplate.subject: Associate Mentor back-up assessments- spaces available from today!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
ASSOCIATE MENTOR BACK-UP ASSESSMENTS Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Back-up assessments: We have organised a range of back-up evening assessment events for those of you who submitted a late application or couldn't attend a previous session. Sign up as soon as possible to be sure of a place! Dates and times as follows:
Today, 5 - 8.30pm in Waterloo
Wednesday 22nd June, 5 - 8.30pm in Leytonstone
Thursday 23rd June, 5 - 8.30pm in Islington
Wednesday 29th June, 5 - 8.30pm in Waterloo
To reserve a space on your desired date please sign up via Eventbrite below:
SIGN UP TO AN ASSESSMENT HERE
If you're going to be 18 during your AM placement: You will need to have a Disclosure and Barring Service Check (DBS). These could take up to 12 weeks to process so get yours started now! Click here for more information and next steps.
If you have any queries about this process, please email tcs.northlondon@the-challenge.org.
We look forward to seeing you in the summer! All the best
NCS Graduates Team The Challenge
